title: Luenell
description:
This week Kevin is joined by comedian Luenell on another all-new episode of Comedy Gold Minds. The pair discuss Luenell’s rise to fame, her start in Oakland, how she got her name the Original Bad Girl of Comedy, and what it’s like touring and working with comedic legend Katt Williams.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (kevin hart, luenell)
